data.comment: The match has started.
Jumpei Iida signals a Sendai throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 1, Sendai to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Sendai are pushing forward but Alexandre Guedes's finish is wide of the goal.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 4, Goal! A Alexandre Guedes header gives Sendai a 1-0 lead in Sendai.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 6, Jumpei Iida awards Sendai a goal kick.
Throw-in Gamba.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Yuki Yamamoto gets an equalizer for Gamba. The score is now 1-1.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 11, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Yuki Yamamoto (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gamba's Takashi Usami gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 15, Goal! Gamba have got their heads in front thanks to a Ademilson strike.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 18, In Sendai Sendai attack through Takahiro Yanagi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai.
Throw-in for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In the minute 30, Sendai pushes forward through Alexandre Guedes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gamba's Takashi Usami misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Sendai.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ademilson for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jumpei Iida awards Sendai a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Important block from the Gamba defence as Keiya Shiihashi fires in a strike for Sendai.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai have been given a penalty at Yurtec Stadium...
In the minute 41, Takuma Nishimura (Sendai) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Gamba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 43, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Sendai's Takuma Nishimura gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 44, Jumpei Iida awards Gamba a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a Gamba throw-in in Sendai's half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 45, At Yurtec Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 48, Sendai's Takuma Hamasaki is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Keiya Shiihashi (Sendai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Keiya Shiihashi (Sendai) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Sendai.
Throw-in for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jumpei Iida signals a Sendai throw-in in Gamba's half.
Takahiro Yanagi (Sendai) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 66, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Gamba have a goal kick.
Gamba make their first substitution with Kazuma Watanabe replacing Ademilson.
Patric is replacing Takashi Usami for the away team.
In the minute 70, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Jumpei Iida awards Gamba a goal kick.
Goal! Shu Kurata extends Gamba's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 75, Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a first substitution, with Shun Nagasawa replacing Alexandre Guedes.
Simao is replacing Yasuhiro Hiraoka for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 78, Sendai to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
The home team have replaced Kunimitsu Sekiguchi with Takayoshi Ishihara. This is the third substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Takashi Kiyama is making the team's fourth substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Ryutaro Iio replacing Takumi Mase.
In the minute 84, Gamba's Kosuke Onose breaks free at Yurtec Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 85, Goal! Gamba extend their lead to 1-4 through Yosuke Ideguchi.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Gamba.
Simao (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Shuhei Kawasaki is replacing Yuki Yamamoto for Gamba at Yurtec Stadium.
The away team have replaced Shu Kurata with Ryu Takao. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 89, Gamba's Genta Miura gets in a shot on goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sendai drive upfield and Takahiro Yanagi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Sendai push forward at Yurtec Stadium and Simao gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Gamba defence.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a Gamba throw-in in Sendai's half.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Kim Young-Gwon gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gamba.
Free kick Gamba.
The match has come to a close in Sendai. The final score is 1-4.
Takuma Nishimura is booked for the home team.
